original_text: And Moses gave commandment, and they caused it to be proclaimed throughout the camp, saying, Let neither man nor woman make any more work for the offering of the sanctuary. So the people were restrained from bringing.
korean_text: 모세가 명령을 내리매 그들이 진중에 공포하여 이르되 남녀를 막론하고 성소에 드릴 예물을 다시 만들지 말라 하매 백성이 가져오기를 그치니

sentences.original_text: and they caused it to be proclaimed throughout the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것을 진영 안에 선포하게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: saying, Let neither man nor woman make any more work
sentences.korean_translation: 이르기를 남자나 여자가 더 이상 일을 만들지 말고

sentences.original_text: for the offering of the sanctuary
So the people were restrained from bringing
